snippet: More photos of the new restaurant in Prospect Heights, Brooklyn, where the small kitchen includes both a rotisserie (for exemplary roast chicken) and a Donut Robot (for fresh cake doughnuts all day).
abstract: More photos of the new restaurant in Prospect Heights, Brooklyn, where the small kitchen includes both a rotisserie (for exemplary roast chicken) and a Donut Robot (for fresh cake doughnuts all day).
